Refinements.Name: Ringing Melody
Descriptions: When a <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, gain 1 stack of <color=#ffffff>Tea-riffic</color>. Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Tea-riffic</color> increases the user's Impact by <color=#2BAD00>0.7%</color>, stacking up to 30 times, and lasting for 8s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. Upon acquiring <color=#ffffff>Tea-riffic</color>, if the equipper possesses stacks of <color=#ffffff>Tea-riffic</color> greater than or equal to 15, all squad members' DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> for 10s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
